article.title: Herley Awarded a $4.7 Million Contract by the Navy for AN/ARA-63 Tactical Instrument Landing Systems for F/A-18E/F/G and E-2D Aircraft
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Herley Industries Incorporated has received an option award exceeding $4.7 million to supply Tactical Instrument Landing Systems for both the F/A-18E/F/G and E-2D Naval aircraft.
